features: Upgrade Portable Mini Ironing Machine: Clothes iron the front of the heating plate is designed in a triangular tip shape, and 360-degree ironing without dead angle, which allows flexible ironing of narrow areas such as buttons, plackets, and collars. Professional micro steam iron has both dry and wet ironing experience to meet individual ironing needs. Even without an ironing board, it can be easily ironed, with different working modes to deal with various scenarios.

Titanium Panel Heating: The Mini steam iron uses a large titanium panel, and irons at a constant temperature of 300℉, in order to make the panel covers more ironing area and removes wrinkles from almost any fabric. 120ML Capacity-The water tank is hidden, it is integrated with the ironing machine, and there is no need to remove it to add water. Before use, you just open the water tank cover and add water to the water tank with a water filling cup.

Easy to Use: Micro steam iron handheld is simple and convenient to use. Turning on the power, and they can be heated to 300°F within 10 seconds, you can iron your clothes directly. Notes: If the clothes are very wrinkled, it is recommended to perform wet ironing after the machine is heated for 30 seconds. The handle can have three angles of points to meet different ways of iron using, and it can be rotated from 0°-90°-180° in order to adjust the space to hold the handle.

Cleaning Features: High temperature and strong steamer iron can easily dissolve and strip the oil stains, dirt, and mold spots on the surface and cracks of household products. The ejection of high-temperature steam at the same time can scrub the surface of objects, and clean them simple, and quick, the effect is remarkable.【Package Include】- 1x mini steam iron, 1x measuring cup, 1x silicone anti-scalding pad, 1x user manual.

Family Travel Essentials: The powerful portable mini travel iron efficiency makes life more refined, auto ironing machine easily removes wrinkles on fabrics such as clothes, shirts, curtains, bed sheets, plush, cotton, linen, and other fabrics. Handheld iron can save space, is a lightweight, compact design, and very suitable for travel and outing use. It can be easily put into suitcases and backpacks and can be easily carried anytime, anywhere.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Handheld Mini Iron for Clothes Are you enthusiastic about caring for your clothes as much as you are when you’re buying them? Steam irons have been a staple for removing wrinkles from dress clothes for years – however many are bulky and inefficiently designed. 1. Our 2-in-1 mini iron can do spray mist of traditional ironing machine type wet ironing experience, can also with its titanium large panel do dry irons, so you don’t have to worry about burning your favorite clothes. 2. Our steamer iron represents a good balance between lots of steam and a water tank that doesn’t need constant refilling.

Power Up Your Ironing Portable Iron Powerful clothing iron is necessary for ironing your fabrics properly. Our professional steam iron will leave you flat-out pleased, and your clothes fresh and polished looking. The titanium panel delivers the ultimate gliding performance over any fabric, delivering professional results right in your home. Titanium Thermostatic Panel Exquisite flat ironing, clothes wrinkle removal, reproduce smooth and smooth multi-dimensional restoration of clothing material sense, make clothing as beautiful as it first appeared. Heated panel at a constant temperature of 300℉, ceramic sheet heating, ironing does not hurt clothes, can be used on silk, plush, wool, cotton, linen, polyester, nylon, and so on. Convenient to Add Water 120ml large capacity, transparent visualization water tank, Integrated machine design， convenient to add water, you can iron a lot of clothes once you fill-up the water. Package Include: 1*Micro Steam Iron 1*Anti-scalding Pad 1*Water Cup 1*User Manual

The iron is easy to use, these are the steps for using it: Step 1: Fill the water reservoir of the iron and perform ironing after the machine is heated for 30 seconds.Step 2: Remove the silicone heat insulation pad, press the button and spray some water mist on your clothes to moisten fabrics and smooth away deep wrinkles.Step 3: Turn off the spray button and start ironing.
Weight 1.4 lbs Voltage 110-240 volts Tank Capacity 120 ML Power 1300 watts

portable Iron It is strong enough for everyday use at home, yet lightweight and compact for taking along with you. If you travel, or if you simply need to touch up garments away from home, the travel iron mini is an ideal appliance. Pointed Curved Design The front of the heating plate is designed in a triangular tip shape, which allows flexible ironing of narrow areas such as buttons, plackets, and collars, allowing the details to be displayed elegantly. Small Iron for Crafts Small but mighty, the handheld steam iron will get into places bigger irons can't reach to set crisp creases and remove wrinkles, making it ideal for quilting, crafting, and more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Travel and Home Use
reviews.reviewText: This mini iron is a must-have for anyone who wants a speedy hassle-free touch up on their outfits when not feeling to deal with complex ironing processes. The handle rotates 180° and the two-in-one design of titanium panel with embedded water tank ensures efficient ironing while saving all the work of carrying a separate water bottle. I love how quickly it heats up and how versatile it is for different fabrics. It’s so light weighted, compact in size, and easy to pack, making it super ideal for frequent travelers. It’s a lifesaver for any lazybones who want to look cute in their outfits!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars This mini iron is weird
reviews.reviewText: I got bought this on sale and just got my package tonight. It seems like this is a used iron I got because I see all these little hairs on the iron and the bag and the water cup has a crack on the side of it. I tested this mini iron out for whenever I travel overseas again. So I just tested the iron on a simple t-shirt I owned and it didn't get the wrinkles out as much as I would have liked. Also I didn't put much water into the iron while utilizing it and it's leaking some water not a lot of water. I will be returning it because the functionality is not where I would like it to be with this steam mini iron while traveling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Efficient and Convenient
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This mini iron has become a staple in my daily routine. It heats up in just 10 seconds, saving me time and energy. The triangular tip shape is perfect for ironing tricky areas, and the 360-degree ironing feature ensures no wrinkles are left behind. The integrated water tank is a genius design, making it easy to add water without any hassle. I can now iron my clothes effortlessly, even without an ironing board. Highly satisfied with this purchase!

Don't let its small size fool you, this mini iron packs a powerful punch. The 1300W heating element ensures quick and efficient ironing. Its compact design is perfect for small spaces or travel. The iron's ability to rotate from 0°-90°-180° is a game-changer when it comes to ironing collars and cuffs. I love how easily it glides over the fabric, leaving it perfectly pressed.
